mapper.select: select from message where (from_id=#{userId} or to_id=#{userId}) and id in (select max(id) from message where status!=2 and from_id!=1 group by conversation_id ) order by id desc limit #{offset},#{rowCnt}
select count(1) from message where (from_id=#{userId} or to_id=#{userId}) and id in (select max(id) from message where status!=2 and from_id!=1 group by conversation_id )
select from message where status!=2 and from_id!=1 and conversation_id=#{conversationId} order by create_time limit #{offset},#{rowCnt}
select count(id) from message where from_id!=1 and status!=2 and conversation_id=#{conversationId}
